abstract: After retiring from Goldman Sachs, Peter D. Kiernan turned his political and economic complaints into a book of advice on America’s problems.
snippet: After retiring from Goldman Sachs, Peter D. Kiernan turned his political and economic complaints into a book of advice on America’s problems.
lead_paragraph: For many former Goldman Sachs partners, an active retirement means traveling the world, becoming a regular on the gala circuit and playing hundreds of holes of golf a week.

headline.main: Former Goldman Partner Now a Self-Fashioned Political Pundit
